page.title: 04Inside Bradley Church
page.content: Inside the church,in the tower,there is a Norman font,which is 900years old and made at the time of the first Domesday Project.It has been carved into a cylinder shape out of a big stone and looks like a big drum.There are lovely patterns on it,these are called cable,billet,fret,greek key and star.A round,but not very deep hole,has been carved in the top and in it there is a little dish with water in it.The vicar blesses the water and uses it for christenings.It has got a large wooden lid with handles.In front of the altar there is a rood screen. It is 60 years old and made of wood and was carved with beautiful lacey patterns by a man called Nathaniel Hitch.You can walk on the top of it where there is a carving of Jesus on the cross.The screen has 9 arches.
